blog.name: doctorstrangeaskblog
blog.title: Ask Doctor Strange
blog.description: Parody motivational fan made roleplay "ask blog" style for the fictional Marvel character Stephen Strange, the sassiest magician of the cosmos, NOT A DOCTOR. I DO NOT rp any innapropriate content with minors and I'll REPORT anyone I see doing so. No profit, just for fun, I'm not affiliated to Marvel or anyone, just fan made. Follow me on Twitter @drstrangefanask

summary:
Stephen: You're SO arrrogant, did you know that?
Tony: I'm not arrogant, my qualities are just better then yours. Besides, YOU...
body:
Stephen: You’re SO arrrogant, did you know that?

Tony: I’m not arrogant, my qualities are just better then yours. Besides, YOU are the arrogant one.

Stephen: Me? Arrogant? It’s just that your attributes are too low, me being me annoys you because you hate the difference of level between us.

Tony: Yeah, I’m Mechanic LV 99 and you’re wizard LV 3.

Stephen: I’m level 3 because I’ve already reached level 100 and decided to start a new game because I’m too good and everything got boring.

Tony: You started over because you wanted to change your avatar, that’s why. Because your choices are the worst.

Stephen: The worst? Must be, I’m wasting my time with a low thing such as you. Literally and metaphorically.

Tony: Oh yeah? Then I’ll take you down.

Stephen: You can’t reach me.

Tony: You’ve fallen low enough.

Rhodey: Just get married you guys.

Pepper: I can’t believe there’s actually TWO of them.

Thor: I’m so glad they play RPG

Peter: Mr.Stark when you and Mister Doctor Strange decide to play RPG again can I play too

summary: Classmate: “So what’s your deal, man? Holland: “Well, do you want to know my secret? I’m actually Spider-Man.” Classmate: “Dude,...
caption:
Classmate: “So what’s your deal, man?

Holland: “Well, do you want to know my secret? I’m actually Spider-Man.”

Classmate: “Dude, you’re not Spider-Man.”

Holland: “No, seriously, I’m an actor. I’m British. I’m playing Spider-Man!”

Classmate: “You’re nuts.” 😜

summary: Spider-Man: Far From Home Director Says Mysterio is Comics-Accurate
title: Spider-Man: Far From Home Director Says Mysterio is Comics-Accurate
excerpt: Jon Watts discusses Mysterio in the upcoming Spider-Man: Far From Home and how he was adapted from the comics.
description:
When Mysterio appeared in the trailers for Spider-Man: Far From Home, he seemed to be an ally of the titular hero rather than the film’s antagonist. However, the role of a hero is strange for someone comic book fans know to be one of Spider-Man’s greatest enemies. Director Jon Watts recently assured fans that Mysterio’s depiction in Far From Home is comic-accurate.

Speaking to Screen Rant, Watts explained that his appearance as shown in the trailers shouldn’t surprise those familiar with the villain. “Mysterio enters the comic as a hero,” he said. “So, I always took it right back to the source material and what made that character exciting initially.”

RELATED:Spider-Man: Far From Home Box Office Forecast Predicts Strong Opening

That comic book entry Watts refers to is Amazing Spider-Man #13, by Stan Lee and Steve Ditko. That story sees Mysterio attempt to frame Spider-Man in order to present himself as a hero. Mysterio initially appears as a heroic figure and is later revealed to be a villain, so Watts’ explanation seems to suggest that the Marvel Cinematic Universe will see a villainous master of illusion in the future.

Opening July 2, director Jon Watts’ Spider-Man: Far From Home stars Tom Holland, Samuel L. Jackson, Zendaya, Cobie Smulders, Jon Favreau, JB Smoove, Jacob Batalon and Martin Starr, with Marisa Tomei and Jake Gyllenhaal.

KEEP READING:Spider-Man: JB Smoove’s Far From Home Role Revealed

blog.name: spideysmcu
blog.title: I'M PETER, PETER PARKER.
blog.description: ur #1 tom holland & peter parker stan.

summary: can’t decide | pt 2 [peter parker x reader]
title: can’t decide | pt 2 [peter parker x reader]
body:
a/n:Okay so i’m sorry i think i’m not gonna be update this imagine too frequently bc kinda busy with finals but i’ll try my best!! enjoy!! also PLEASE FEEL FREE TO REQUEST MORE PARTS OR ANYTHING!! REQUESTS AND MY ASKS ARE OPEN!

word count:1.2k+ idk?

pt 2. summary:peter and the reader finally go to their waltz practice but peter is off.

warnings: little angst??,, peter being a dork,, but also a mad dork??


You knew that being partners with Peter was someting that would make you a lot comfortable than anyone else, because when you were with him you could actually relax and be yourself he always made you feel special and better, no matter how cliche that sounded it was true.

As thoughts like waltz were crossing through your mind you went into your biology class finding your assigned (but unassigned) seat (that was behind Peter) carefully taking a place, as the teacher went on to teach you about stuff you could barely understand, your eye caught Peter who was looking over to Liz, you felt a little something in your stomach after seeing a scene like this.

It felt weird to think that Peter would actually look at someone lovingly, you didn’t blame him though Liz was absolutely gorgeous and you couldn’t let your weird unexplained jealousy get in the way of your friendship so you tried your best to shake it off.But to your surprise things got a bit weirder towards lunch.

Lunch was your favorite thing about school, and no you didn’t mean this in a quirky girls who thinks liking food is a personality trait, because you actually enjoyed having time with your friends and eating even though the meal was average, so you thought no one could take your favorite thing away but boy you were wrong.

As you grabbed your what seemed to be spaghetti on your tray and walked towards your usual table with Ned,MJ and Peter you saw a fourth head popping up you mentally cursed yourself and said “Please don’t be Liz, please don’t be Liz, please don’t be Liz.” and guess what? It was Liz. You smiled in a weird way and set down your tray on the table.

“Oh hi Y/N! I hope it is okay that I’m joining you guys for lunch, I was gonna ask you guys something!” Liz said excitedly and you literally thought to yourself about how she is both pretty and super nice.

You smiled once again and said “Oh, of course not! What’s up?” you said trying to sound excited about what she was going to say “Well, I am gonna have a party at my house this weekend and I would love all of you to come!” she said excitedly “Oh, I’m not sure about that I have the whole Stark Internship stuff and-” Liz turned to look at Peter and said “God Peter you always do this! Please for once live a little!” 

Peter knew that he wouldn’t wanna go to a stupid party without you there so he quickly turned over to you and said “What do you say waltz partner?” you looked up in surprise as he asked you and said “Oh, uhm sure why not.”  

Liz squealed loudly and hugged Peter out of excitement which caused Peter to giggle softly, Ned and MJ were just watching the whole scene rolling out knowing that they would be okay with whatever you guys were doing.

But they were silent because they realised you looking at them, wistfully, they both quietly chuckled understanding what the actual fuck was going on.

As Liz finally left your lunch table you went back to normal and Ned and MJ started questioning you guys about the whole waltz thing, the so confident Y/N who signed them up for waltz vanished for that whole hour.

For some reason you felt insecure about it, the waltz thing, Peter you were quite embarrassed talking about it which was not you.

The whole waltz thing was kind of hard though, as you and Peter went to your first class or practice whatever (which was after school btw and was even more tiring), you knew a little bit of waltz from past experiences and Peter literally knew nothing but he was doing it better than you, you kept getting nervous and blushing and fucking it up.

For someone who knew how to waltz you were a disaster, plus because your friends were there too you were kind of distracted because focusing on Peter seemed kind of weird to you  because you kept blushing.

As you kept getting distracted and more distracted with talking to Hary.  Peter was growing out of his patience, you didn’t realise it would be a problem but boy he was pissed.

You were supposed to do a little turning move that was easy and everyone except you guys could do it so Peter was frustrated because he really wanted to make this work, hell he even watched videos at home and practiced with May for hours just to not fuck this up but you seemed careless to him and you kept chatting up with this new guy from your Spanish class and he couldn’t take that.

As the song started and you were just about to do the turning move, your friend started mouthing you something from far away which caused you to get distracted once again making you miss out the move and ruin the whole waltz. 

Peter furiously looked into your eyes “Y/N can you fucking focus for once?” he said a little loudly. You were shocked by his sudden tone of change “Peter.. can you calm down?” you said worriedly and he just shook his head

“I’m trying to take this shit serious, can you fucking do that too I know it must be hard for you to spend 5 minutes without talking to a guy but still!” you were beyond shocked at what he was implying to “What the fuck does that mean Parker?” he was trying his best to calm down but it didn’t seem possible so he stormed out. Leaving you alone and frustrated. 

MJ and Ned seeing everything came to you after the practice by saying stupid jokes like “You know in relationships you do fight right.” But you just shook them off taking your bags and leaving the practice, as you left school you realised that you were supposed to walk home with Peter because it was really late and Peter didn’t want you walking all alone at dark, but since he popped off for no reason, you mentally cursed yourself and tried walking home in the fastest way possible.

New York is a safe city, New York is a safe city, New York is a safe city you kept repeating yourself this as you were walking through some dark alleys, you literally felt like those stupid characters in horror movies who would choose the dumbest way and die instantly.

As you were walking you felt (you know that feeling like when someone is behind you) you felt that and slowly turned around fearing for your life, you saw nothing and a sighed in relief “Isn’t it dangerous for a girl like you to hang around this late in a dark alley, do you wish to get yourself killed?” said the superhero as he landed in front of you, you were petrified with his surprise entrance and started punching him in the arm “FUUCK! Why would you do that?” she said in a horrified voice.

“Ow! Ow, heyy! What did I do, I am trying to save your ass!” he said rubbing his arm and holding it as if he wasn’t a superhero that handled much painful and stronger hits.

“Is that how you save people by scaring the shit out of them, Jesus!” she exclaimed and tried to catch her breath. He chuckled quietly “I’m sorry, you just seemed scared and it’s dark so I thought I could walk you to your home.” 

“Sorry spider-man but how do I know that you’re not some old creep? What am I supposed to do just give you my adress? Do you want my security number too while you’re at it?” Peter was truly offended but then he remembered how he kept the secret from you so he softened.

“I wouldn’t want you to walk home on your own, I swear I’m not a creep, please just let me walk you home safely.” you looked up at him admiring him and for some reason you felt like you could trust him.

After a few tries of him trying to make you accept it you finally gave in and he helped you get home safely,most of the way you walked and chatted he was quite fun to talk with but when both of you got kinda tired from walking he decided to take you by your waist and take you home in a much faster way. Him holding you while shooting webs and screaming “WOOO!” was one of the best things that happened to you and considering how shitty your day went this whole thing felt really nice to you.

As Peter finally dropped you of on home by the window safely, he looked at you one last time and said “See you later, uhm, what’s your name?” he said pretending his best to not know you. “Uh-, it’s Y/N.” you smiled up at him “It was nice chatting up with you but I’ve gotta a whole city to save, see you later Y/N. ” you watched as he kept shooting webs and screaming “WOOO!” once again making you giggle. “See you later,spidey.”

You were so tired. so tired. You could barely get yourself to put your pajamas on and you huffed falling down on your bed, falling asleep wasn’t going to be hard you thought, but then all of a sudden you started thinking about Spiderman.

How he was supposed to be this big mighty hero he indeed was a hero but he was also a dork, a big one and was really cute.

“Peter is gonna flip when I tell him about how I saw Spiderman yesterday.” 

You thought and smirked to yourself as you knew how jealous Peter -also let’s not forget Ned- was going to be when they realized you met the big hero, more importantly the mighty hero walked you home.

Then it hit you, you were supposed to be mad at Peter, he was weird and extremely angry today for no reason, and you remember how much at that moment he irritated you, then  you huffed once again at the thought of seeing Peter tomorrow and tried to put off your thoughts about it all at once and went to sleep.

a/n:Okay so i’m sorry i think i’m not gonna be update this imagine too frequently bc kinda busy with finals but i’ll try my best!! enjoy!! also PLEASE FEEL FREE TO REQUEST MORE PARTS OR ANYTHING!! REQUESTS AND MY ASKS ARE OPEN!

pt 2. summary:peter and the reader finally go to their waltz practice but peter is off.

warnings: little angst??,, peter being a dork,, but also a mad dork??


You knew that being partners with Peter was someting that would make you a lot comfortable than anyone else, because when you were with him you could actually relax and be yourself he always made you feel special and better, no matter how cliche that sounded it was true.

As thoughts like waltz were crossing through your mind you went into your biology class finding your assigned (but unassigned) seat (that was behind Peter) carefully taking a place, as the teacher went on to teach you about stuff you could barely understand, your eye caught Peter who was looking over to Liz, you felt a little something in your stomach after seeing a scene like this.

It felt weird to think that Peter would actually look at someone lovingly, you didn’t blame him though Liz was absolutely gorgeous and you couldn’t let your weird unexplained jealousy get in the way of your friendship so you tried your best to shake it off.But to your surprise things got a bit weirder towards lunch.

Lunch was your favorite thing about school, and no you didn’t mean this in a quirky girls who thinks liking food is a personality trait, because you actually enjoyed having time with your friends and eating even though the meal was average, so you thought no one could take your favorite thing away but boy you were wrong.

As you grabbed your what seemed to be spaghetti on your tray and walked towards your usual table with Ned,MJ and Peter you saw a fourth head popping up you mentally cursed yourself and said “Please don’t be Liz, please don’t be Liz, please don’t be Liz.” and guess what? It was Liz. You smiled in a weird way and set down your tray on the table.

“Oh hi Y/N! I hope it is okay that I’m joining you guys for lunch, I was gonna ask you guys something!” Liz said excitedly and you literally thought to yourself about how she is both pretty and super nice.

You smiled once again and said “Oh, of course not! What’s up?” you said trying to sound excited about what she was going to say “Well, I am gonna have a party at my house this weekend and I would love all of you to come!” she said excitedly “Oh, I’m not sure about that I have the whole Stark Internship stuff and-” Liz turned to look at Peter and said “God Peter you always do this! Please for once live a little!” 

Peter knew that he wouldn’t wanna go to a stupid party without you there so he quickly turned over to you and said “What do you say waltz partner?” you looked up in surprise as he asked you and said “Oh, uhm sure why not.”  

Liz squealed loudly and hugged Peter out of excitement which caused Peter to giggle softly, Ned and MJ were just watching the whole scene rolling out knowing that they would be okay with whatever you guys were doing.

But they were silent because they realised you looking at them, wistfully, they both quietly chuckled understanding what the actual fuck was going on.

As Liz finally left your lunch table you went back to normal and Ned and MJ started questioning you guys about the whole waltz thing, the so confident Y/N who signed them up for waltz vanished for that whole hour.

For some reason you felt insecure about it, the waltz thing, Peter you were quite embarrassed talking about it which was not you.

The whole waltz thing was kind of hard though, as you and Peter went to your first class or practice whatever (which was after school btw and was even more tiring), you knew a little bit of waltz from past experiences and Peter literally knew nothing but he was doing it better than you, you kept getting nervous and blushing and fucking it up.

For someone who knew how to waltz you were a disaster, plus because your friends were there too you were kind of distracted because focusing on Peter seemed kind of weird to you  because you kept blushing.

As you kept getting distracted and more distracted with talking to Hary.  Peter was growing out of his patience, you didn’t realise it would be a problem but boy he was pissed.

You were supposed to do a little turning move that was easy and everyone except you guys could do it so Peter was frustrated because he really wanted to make this work, hell he even watched videos at home and practiced with May for hours just to not fuck this up but you seemed careless to him and you kept chatting up with this new guy from your Spanish class and he couldn’t take that.

As the song started and you were just about to do the turning move, your friend started mouthing you something from far away which caused you to get distracted once again making you miss out the move and ruin the whole waltz. 

Peter furiously looked into your eyes “Y/N can you fucking focus for once?” he said a little loudly. You were shocked by his sudden tone of change “Peter.. can you calm down?” you said worriedly and he just shook his head

“I’m trying to take this shit serious, can you fucking do that too I know it must be hard for you to spend 5 minutes without talking to a guy but still!” you were beyond shocked at what he was implying to “What the fuck does that mean Parker?” he was trying his best to calm down but it didn’t seem possible so he stormed out. Leaving you alone and frustrated. 

MJ and Ned seeing everything came to you after the practice by saying stupid jokes like “You know in relationships you do fight right.” But you just shook them off taking your bags and leaving the practice, as you left school you realised that you were supposed to walk home with Peter because it was really late and Peter didn’t want you walking all alone at dark, but since he popped off for no reason, you mentally cursed yourself and tried walking home in the fastest way possible.

New York is a safe city, New York is a safe city, New York is a safe city you kept repeating yourself this as you were walking through some dark alleys, you literally felt like those stupid characters in horror movies who would choose the dumbest way and die instantly.

As you were walking you felt (you know that feeling like when someone is behind you) you felt that and slowly turned around fearing for your life, you saw nothing and a sighed in relief “Isn’t it dangerous for a girl like you to hang around this late in a dark alley, do you wish to get yourself killed?” said the superhero as he landed in front of you, you were petrified with his surprise entrance and started punching him in the arm “FUUCK! Why would you do that?” she said in a horrified voice.

“Ow! Ow, heyy! What did I do, I am trying to save your ass!” he said rubbing his arm and holding it as if he wasn’t a superhero that handled much painful and stronger hits.

“Is that how you save people by scaring the shit out of them, Jesus!” she exclaimed and tried to catch her breath. He chuckled quietly “I’m sorry, you just seemed scared and it’s dark so I thought I could walk you to your home.” 

“Sorry spider-man but how do I know that you’re not some old creep? What am I supposed to do just give you my adress? Do you want my security number too while you’re at it?” Peter was truly offended but then he remembered how he kept the secret from you so he softened.

“I wouldn’t want you to walk home on your own, I swear I’m not a creep, please just let me walk you home safely.” you looked up at him admiring him and for some reason you felt like you could trust him.

After a few tries of him trying to make you accept it you finally gave in and he helped you get home safely,most of the way you walked and chatted he was quite fun to talk with but when both of you got kinda tired from walking he decided to take you by your waist and take you home in a much faster way. Him holding you while shooting webs and screaming “WOOO!” was one of the best things that happened to you and considering how shitty your day went this whole thing felt really nice to you.

As Peter finally dropped you of on home by the window safely, he looked at you one last time and said “See you later, uhm, what’s your name?” he said pretending his best to not know you. “Uh-, it’s Y/N.” you smiled up at him “It was nice chatting up with you but I’ve gotta a whole city to save, see you later Y/N. ” you watched as he kept shooting webs and screaming “WOOO!” once again making you giggle. “See you later,spidey.”

You were so tired. so tired. You could barely get yourself to put your pajamas on and you huffed falling down on your bed, falling asleep wasn’t going to be hard you thought, but then all of a sudden you started thinking about Spiderman.

How he was supposed to be this big mighty hero he indeed was a hero but he was also a dork, a big one and was really cute.

“Peter is gonna flip when I tell him about how I saw Spiderman yesterday.” 

You thought and smirked to yourself as you knew how jealous Peter -also let’s not forget Ned- was going to be when they realized you met the big hero, more importantly the mighty hero walked you home.

Then it hit you, you were supposed to be mad at Peter, he was weird and extremely angry today for no reason, and you remember how much at that moment he irritated you, then  you huffed once again at the thought of seeing Peter tomorrow and tried to put off your thoughts about it all at once and went to sleep.

blog.name: domesticatedavengersdoingstuff
blog.title: This week on the Avengers
blog.description: Ever wondered what Marvel characters did in their daily lives? Be a lot cooler if ya did.  Come with Sass or don't come at all.

summary:
Bucky to Peter: I’m fluent in Bird. I can speak to them. 
Peter, excited: Really?! Like, talk to the birds?!
Bucky, shit eating...
body:
Bucky to Peter: I’m fluent in Bird. I can speak to them.

Peter, excited: Really?! Like, talk to the birds?!

Bucky, shit eating grin: Yeah kid, watch.

Bucky shouting across the room: Hey Sam!

Sam: No.

Bucky to Peter: see? He understood.

Peter with stars in his eyes: whoa…

Bucky shouting across the room: Hey Sam!

Sam: No.

Bucky to Peter: see? He understood.

Peter with stars in his eyes: whoa…
trail.content:
Bucky to Peter: I’m fluent in Bird. I can speak to them.

Peter, excited: Really?! Like, talk to the birds?!

Bucky, shit eating grin: Yeah kid, watch.

Bucky shouting across the room: Hey Sam!

Sam: No.

Bucky to Peter: see? He understood.

Peter with stars in his eyes: whoa…
